content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (40.0, -80.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 40.0, -80.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when setting the recipe for the Stone Furnace
- Ensure that the Stone Furnace is placed correctly and is accessible before attempting to set its recipe. Verify that the entity exists and is the correct type.

### Errors related to furnace inventory and operation
- Check that the Stone Furnace has sufficient ingredients and energy to operate. If it is not working, ensure that coal is inserted and that the furnace is enabled.

### Errors when inserting items into the Stone Furnace
- Make sure to insert the correct items into the Stone Furnace based on the recipe requirements. Verify that the items are available in the inventory before attempting to insert them.
